content.query:
---------------------------------------
----Create a View for dim_customer
---------------------------------------

CREATE VIEW gold.dim_customer
AS
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://stretailenvdev.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/dim_customer',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS query1;
